Name: Mushroom Sauce Lv.1
Description2$english: Mushroom sauce in a beautiful bottle, with some finely chopped mushroom pieces hidden inside. With the addition of honey, butter, and special processing, the mushroom taste is gone, leaving only a unique texture and rich nutrition. It works wonders for picky children who hate eating mushrooms.

recipes.Name: Gulu Sauce
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 80% and 20%, respectively.
Elegantly packed in charming glass jars, this mushroom medley sauce hides tender morsels of chopped fungi. It's special-cooked with honey and butter to soften its earthy flavor, resulting in a velvety texture and nourishing richness. A clever way to sneak in nutrients, even for the most discerning little mushroom-haters.

NeedMaterial.Name: Glowshroom
NeedMaterial.Description: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Growing in damp, shadowy environments, it emits an eerie glow at night.

NeedMaterial.Name: Butter
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Rich in nutrients but high in fat, so don't overconsume it.
